caption:
CAUGHT ON DASHCAM - No matter how well you drive, it's always the other vehicles committing mistakes is what makes our roads unsafe. In this case, our reaction time and anticipation is what makes us safer drivers. This incident was caught on a 4K dashcam. It was the biker who did not yield to the car driver. Vehicles going straight have the right if way so the biker should have stopped for the car.
#RoadSafety
video_summary: A near-miss incident occurred at night near Marathahalli, India, captured by a 4K dashcam. A car, driving straight with the right of way, was almost collided with by a motorcycle. The motorcyclist failed to yield to the car, stopping at the last moment, which constituted a traffic rule violation. It was suggested that the biker might have been rushing to meet delivery targets. The incident could have been avoided if the biker had yielded and both parties had practiced defensive driving.
